amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow for the expansion of areas designated as renewal communities based on 2000 census data.

action.text: Amendment SA 651, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 651 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 651 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S6451-6456; text: CR S6455) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow for the expansion of areas designated as renewal communities based on 2000 census data.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 651 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Schumer.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 651 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
